data.title: Mi Fu: Poem Written in a Boat on the Wu River
data.meta_description: Title: Mi Fu: Poem Written in a Boat on the Wu River, Pages: 1 Pages, Publish Date: 23rd Sep 2022, Author: Edited by Cheryl Wong, Edited by Xu Kexin, ISBN: 9781913536725. A series of masterpieces of calligraphy from famous masters of two Chinese dynasties, presented in the traditional format of a handscroll.
data.text:
Full Description

The series contains a selection of masterpieces by famous Chinese calligraphers through the ages, which can be unfolded and viewed in the form of traditional hand scrolls. The series features a selection of masterpieces from the Northern Song and Tang dynasties. The hand scrolls are accompanied by expert interpretations, analysing the layout and features of the calligraphy, and guiding the reader through the beauty of calligraphy in an insightful text.
